bibl.title: Gordian III or Gordian I?
bibl.note: Revised text of P. Leid. Inv. F 1948/3.4 [ed.: K. A. Worp, OMRL 67 (1987) pp. 25-28, 1 pl.]. Discussion of the imperial titulature. The papyrus has been wrongly ascribed to the years A.D. 239-243. It represents a different stage of events either before or after that period, in A.D. 238 or A.D. 244.
Rea John R., Gordian III or Gordian I?
